nodes.html: We take pragmatic approaches and sometimes go unconventional.
We look for sustainability in cooperation and projects.

cooperationYou.html: You have an adventurous software project ahead and you need a reliable partner?

cooperationUs.html: Only together we can build great software, is it as partner or colleague.

exchange.html:
In a small team we love to develop exciting software solutions of all kinds.

We are specialized in modern, contemporary web applications.

We are not afraid of new technologies and means to develop the perfect product for you.

nodes.html: With this tool you can organize your certification process. It lets you invite people periodically to get certified, runs the certification process and hands you nicely designed PDF documents upon successful certification.

frontmatter.title: Unattended online certification tool for an international organization

nodes.html: This product is a minimalist, easy-to-use, opensource tool to track time efficiently. By it being completely free to use it gives everyone the change to handle their time management professionally.

It's a progressive web application, which has offline capabilities. After the device which runs the application comes back online the data is synchronized. It helps you to log street condition and makes statistics out of it.

frontmatter.title: Mobile protocol management tool for a government organization
